sentence.Network_en: The helmsman could tack the boat singlehanded.
sentence.Network_cn: 舵手独自一人就能变换航向。

sentence.Network_en: The other man saw that he had no chance singlehanded against the bear.
sentence.Network_cn: 另外一个人看到自己不能单独抵抗这只熊.

sentence.Network_en: Nothing could prevent him to sail round the world singlehanded.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有什么能阻止他独自一人作环球航行.

Ben 10 外星英雄 - 维基百科，自由的百科全书 ... Vreedle,Vreedle 物归原主 Singlehanded 断手记 If All Else Fails 同归于尽.
singlegrainsowing 粒播, singlehanded 独力的, singlegrainstructure 单粒结构

entry.tran: 独自地;单独地;无人帮助地;单枪匹马地
entry.def: If you do something single-handed, you do it on your own, without help from anyone else.

example.ex: I brought up my seven children single-handed...
example.tran: 我独自一人抚养了 7 个孩子。

example.ex: She changed the face of British politics almost single-handed.
example.tran: 她几乎是一手改变了英国政治的面貌。
